```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> x = np.array([[1, -1, 0], [2, -1, 3], [7, 4, -1]])
>>> masked_x = np.ma.masked_array(x, mask=x < 0)
>>> masked_x
masked_array(
 data=[[1, --, 0],
 [2, --, 3],
 [7, 4, --]],
 mask=[[False,  True, False],
 [False,  True, False],
 [False, False,  True]],
 fill_value=999999) 
```
